exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : Z H1 : rel_prime m n H2 : distinct_parity m n Unable to unify "rel_prime m n" with "rel_prime (m + n + (n - m)) (m + n - (n - m))".

In environment x, x0 : Z H3 : forall x1 : Z, (x1 | x0 * 1) -> (x1 | x * 1) -> (x1 | 1) H2 : distinct_parity (x0 * 1) (x * 1) Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (?M2379 * ?M2379) (?M2380 * ?M2380) 1" with "Zis_gcd (x0 * 1 + x * 1 + (x * 1 - x0 * 1)) (x0 * 1 + x * 1 - (x * 1 - x0 * 1)) 1".

In environment H : forall m n : Z, rel_prime m n -> rel_prime (m * m) (n * n) x, x0 : Z H3 : forall x1 : Z, (x1 | x0 * 1) -> (x1 | x * 1) -> (x1 | 1) H2 : distinct_parity (x0 * 1) (x * 1) Unable to unify "?M2865 - ?M2866 = ?M2867 + ?M2865 - (?M2867 + ?M2866)" with "Zis_gcd (x0 * 1 + x * 1 + (x * 1 - x0 * 1)) (x0 * 1 + x * 1 - (x * 1 - x0 * 1)) 1".

original: intros m n H1 H2. apply relp_sum. apply H1. apply prop2. apply Zminus_plus_simpl_l_reverse.
